import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Tag"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/content/tags/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete the tag with the given `key`.

You can find more information about tags [here](../../docs/guides/content/tags).

### Locale
Tags can have multiple translations for `name` and `description`.
You can specify a `locale` to generate the corresponding translation.

If no locale is specified, the applications default locale will be used.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](../../docs/guides/configuration).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  from a member of the [`CONTRIBUTOR`](../../docs/guides/content/introduction#global-server-group-contributor) group.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
